roleset.name: accuse of a crime again

roles.note: See indict.01 for examples of all arguments.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: But now , along with PRO reindicting Mr. Noriega 's pal , they intended to charge Mr. Noriega himself , on allegations that he was involved in the illegal trading of some $ 2 million in arms

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to indict.01.
